name: Firekeeper (Team Ninobi)
description:
Firekeeper is a relaxing narrative exploration game with platforming elements, set among the windtorn peaks of a distant mountain range.

As the new mountain ranger, you're to receive training from the former ranger before taking over. When you arrive however, you're met only with a letter.

Note that in this demo, you are free to explore the full landscape of the final game, but the current content is limited to the opening area, including two interior locations.
You will know you have experienced all of the cuurrent story content when there is smoke coming from the chimney of the first ranger cabin you encounter.

This demo for Firekeeper is a student project created by a core team of two. The intent is to later on release an updated demo, and eventually a continuation and complete game.
